meta.source: 0nMCP v2.2.0 — all services verified against catalog.js + crm/ + vault/ + engine/ + deed/
meta.pricing_note: Pre-configured combos are one-time purchase. Per-use execution fees apply on 0nmcp.com.

pro.label: Pro
pro.applies_to: 2-service capabilities with AI processing or complex logic

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to Welcome Email
capabilities.description: When a new contact is created in the CRM, automatically send a personalized welcome email via Gmail.
capabilities.example_action: Send personalized welcome email via Gmail

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Notify your sales team in Slack whenever a new contact is created in the CRM.
capabilities.example_action: Post to #sales Slack channel with contact details

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to SMS Welcome
capabilities.description: Send an automated SMS welcome message via Twilio when a new contact is added to the CRM.

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to Mailchimp Audience
capabilities.description: Automatically add new CRM contacts to your Mailchimp audience for email marketing campaigns.

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to HubSpot Sync
capabilities.description: Keep HubSpot in sync by creating a contact there whenever a new contact is added to the CRM.

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log every new CRM contact as a row in Google Sheets for reporting and tracking.
capabilities.example_action: Append row to Google Sheets with contact data

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to Discord Alert
capabilities.description: Post a notification to your Discord server when a new contact is added to the CRM.

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to Notion Page
capabilities.description: Create a Notion page for each new CRM contact for detailed notes and project tracking.
capabilities.example_action: Create Notion page with contact properties

capabilities.name: New CRM Opportunity to Airtable Record
capabilities.description: Track CRM opportunities in Airtable by creating a record for each new deal.
capabilities.example_action: Create Airtable record with deal details

capabilities.name: New CRM Contact to Calendar Booking Link
capabilities.description: When a new contact is added to the CRM, send them a Calendly booking link via email.
sxo_queries: auto schedule meeting with new contact
capabilities.example_action: Send email with Calendly booking link

capabilities.name: New Stripe Payment to CRM Contact Update
capabilities.description: When a Stripe payment succeeds, update the CRM contact with payment details and tag them as a customer.
capabilities.example_action: Update CRM contact with payment amount and add 'customer' tag

capabilities.name: New Stripe Payment to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: Celebrate every payment! Post a notification to Slack when a Stripe payment is received.
capabilities.example_action: Post payment alert to #revenue Slack channel

capabilities.name: New Stripe Payment to Gmail Receipt
capabilities.description: Send a custom thank-you email via Gmail when a Stripe payment comes through.

capabilities.name: New Stripe Payment to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log every Stripe payment as a row in Google Sheets for accounting and reporting.

capabilities.name: New Stripe Payment to SMS Confirmation
capabilities.description: Send an SMS confirmation via Twilio when a Stripe payment is processed.

capabilities.name: New Shopify Order to CRM Contact
capabilities.description: Create or update a CRM contact whenever a new Shopify order comes in.
capabilities.example_action: Create/update CRM contact with order data

capabilities.name: New Shopify Order to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Get instant Slack notifications for every new Shopify order.
capabilities.example_action: Post order details to #orders Slack channel

capabilities.name: New Shopify Order to Gmail Receipt
capabilities.description: Send a custom order confirmation email via Gmail for every new Shopify order.

capabilities.name: Gmail to Slack Forwarding
capabilities.description: Forward important Gmail messages to a Slack channel for team visibility.
capabilities.example_action: Post email summary to Slack channel

capabilities.name: Gmail to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log incoming emails to Google Sheets for tracking, auditing, or lead scoring.
capabilities.example_action: Append row with sender, subject, and date

capabilities.name: Gmail to CRM Contact
capabilities.description: Automatically create a CRM contact when you receive an email from someone new.
capabilities.example_trigger: New Gmail message from unknown sender
capabilities.example_action: Create CRM contact from email sender

capabilities.name: Mailchimp Campaign to Slack Report
capabilities.description: Post Mailchimp campaign performance reports to Slack after a campaign is sent.
capabilities.example_action: Post open rate and click stats to Slack

capabilities.name: SendGrid Email to CRM Activity Log
capabilities.description: Log SendGrid email events (opens, clicks) as activities on the CRM contact.

capabilities.name: Google Calendar Event to Slack Reminder
capabilities.description: Post a reminder to Slack when a Google Calendar event is about to start.
capabilities.example_trigger: Google Calendar event starting in 15 minutes

capabilities.name: Google Calendar Event to SMS Reminder
capabilities.description: Send an SMS reminder via Twilio before a Google Calendar event starts.

capabilities.name: Calendly Booking to CRM Contact
capabilities.description: When someone books via Calendly, automatically create or update their CRM contact.
capabilities.example_action: Create/update CRM contact with booking details

capabilities.name: Calendly Booking to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Notify your team in Slack when someone books a meeting through Calendly.

capabilities.name: Calendly Booking to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log every Calendly booking to Google Sheets for scheduling analytics.

capabilities.name: Zoom Recording to Google Drive
capabilities.description: Automatically save Zoom meeting recordings to Google Drive for archiving.
capabilities.example_action: Upload recording to Google Drive folder

capabilities.name: Zoom Meeting to Slack Summary
capabilities.description: Post a summary to Slack after a Zoom meeting ends.

capabilities.name: GitHub Issue to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Post to Slack when a new GitHub issue is created on your repository.
capabilities.example_action: Post issue details to #engineering Slack channel

capabilities.name: GitHub PR to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Notify your team in Slack when a new pull request is opened.

capabilities.name: GitHub Issue to Discord Alert
capabilities.description: Alert your Discord community when a new GitHub issue is filed.

capabilities.name: GitHub Issue to Jira Issue
capabilities.description: Automatically create a Jira issue when a GitHub issue is opened for cross-platform tracking.

capabilities.name: GitHub Issue to Linear Issue
capabilities.description: Create a Linear issue when a GitHub issue is opened for development tracking.

capabilities.name: Jira Issue to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Post to Slack when a Jira issue is created or updated.

capabilities.name: Jira Issue to Gmail Assignee Notification
capabilities.description: Email the assignee when they are assigned a new Jira issue.

capabilities.name: Linear Issue to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Post to Slack when a new Linear issue is created.

capabilities.name: Supabase Row Insert to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: Send a Slack notification when a new row is inserted into a Supabase table.

capabilities.name: MongoDB Insert to Gmail Notification
capabilities.description: Send an email notification when a new document is inserted into MongoDB.

capabilities.name: Airtable Record to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Post to Slack when a new record is created in Airtable.

capabilities.name: Airtable Record to Gmail Email
capabilities.description: Send an email via Gmail when a new record is added to Airtable.

capabilities.name: Airtable Record to CRM Contact
capabilities.description: Create a CRM contact from an Airtable record for lead tracking.
capabilities.example_action: Create CRM contact from record fields

capabilities.name: Google Sheets Row to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: Send a Slack notification when a new row is added to Google Sheets.
capabilities.example_trigger: New row appended to Google Sheets

capabilities.name: Google Sheets Row to CRM Contact
capabilities.description: Import contacts from a Google Sheets row directly into the CRM.
capabilities.example_action: Create CRM contact from row data

capabilities.name: Notion Page to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Notify your team in Slack when a new page is created in Notion.

capabilities.name: Notion Page to Gmail Summary
capabilities.description: Email a summary when a new Notion page is created — great for meeting notes.

capabilities.name: Google Drive File to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: Get a Slack notification when a new file is uploaded to Google Drive.

capabilities.name: Zendesk Ticket to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: Post to Slack when a new Zendesk support ticket is created.

capabilities.name: Zendesk Ticket to CRM Activity
capabilities.description: Log Zendesk tickets as activities on the CRM contact for a unified customer view.
capabilities.example_action: Update CRM contact with support ticket info

capabilities.name: Zendesk Ticket to Gmail Acknowledgment
capabilities.description: Send a custom acknowledgment email via Gmail when a Zendesk ticket is created.

capabilities.name: OpenAI Response to Gmail Email
capabilities.description: Generate an AI response with OpenAI and send it as an email via Gmail.

capabilities.name: OpenAI Response to Slack Message
capabilities.description: Generate AI content with OpenAI and post it to a Slack channel.

capabilities.name: OpenAI Image to Google Drive
capabilities.description: Generate an image with DALL-E and automatically save it to Google Drive.
capabilities.example_action: Upload image to Google Drive folder

capabilities.name: OpenAI Text to Notion Page
capabilities.description: Generate content with OpenAI and create a Notion page with the result.
capabilities.example_action: Create Notion page with AI content

capabilities.name: OpenAI Embedding to MongoDB Store
capabilities.description: Generate text embeddings with OpenAI and store them in MongoDB for vector search.
capabilities.example_action: Generate embedding and insert into MongoDB

capabilities.name: HubSpot Deal to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: Notify your team in Slack when a new deal is created in HubSpot.

capabilities.name: HubSpot Contact to CRM Sync
capabilities.description: Keep CRM in sync by creating contacts when new ones appear in HubSpot.

capabilities.name: HubSpot Deal to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log every HubSpot deal to Google Sheets for revenue tracking.

capabilities.name: Microsoft Outlook Email to Slack
capabilities.description: Forward important Outlook emails to a Slack channel.

capabilities.name: Microsoft Teams Message to Discord
capabilities.description: Bridge Microsoft Teams and Discord by forwarding messages between platforms.

capabilities.name: Microsoft Calendar to Gmail Invite
capabilities.description: Send a Gmail notification when an Outlook calendar event is created.

capabilities.name: Stripe + CRM + Slack: Payment Pipeline
capabilities.description: When a Stripe payment succeeds, update the CRM contact AND notify Slack — a complete payment pipeline.
capabilities.example_action: Update CRM contact + post to #revenue Slack channel

capabilities.name: Gmail + CRM + Twilio: Lead Capture Pipeline
capabilities.description: When a new email arrives, create a CRM contact AND send an SMS follow-up — instant lead capture.
capabilities.example_action: Create CRM contact + send SMS welcome

capabilities.name: GitHub + Slack + Jira: Dev Pipeline
capabilities.description: When a GitHub issue is opened, notify Slack AND create a Jira issue for tracking.
capabilities.example_action: Post to #engineering Slack + create Jira issue

capabilities.name: Shopify + CRM + Slack: Order Pipeline
capabilities.description: New Shopify order triggers CRM contact creation AND Slack team notification.

capabilities.name: Calendly + CRM + Slack: Booking Pipeline
capabilities.description: When a Calendly booking happens, create a CRM contact AND notify your team in Slack.
capabilities.example_action: Create CRM contact + post to #meetings Slack

capabilities.name: Zendesk + CRM + Slack: Support Pipeline
capabilities.description: New support ticket logs to CRM AND alerts the team in Slack.

capabilities.name: CRM + Gmail + Google Sheets: Lead Nurture Pipeline
capabilities.description: New CRM contact triggers a welcome email AND logs to Google Sheets for tracking.
capabilities.example_action: Send welcome email + log to spreadsheet

capabilities.name: Stripe + Gmail + Google Sheets: Invoice Pipeline
capabilities.description: Stripe payment triggers a thank-you email AND logs the payment to a spreadsheet.
capabilities.example_action: Send receipt email + log to spreadsheet

capabilities.name: OpenAI + Gmail + CRM: AI Lead Response
capabilities.description: Generate an AI response with OpenAI, send it via Gmail, and log the interaction in the CRM.
capabilities.example_action: AI generates response → sends email → updates CRM

capabilities.name: Mailchimp + CRM + Slack: Campaign Pipeline
capabilities.description: When a Mailchimp campaign is sent, update CRM contacts AND notify the marketing team in Slack.
capabilities.example_action: Update CRM + post stats to #marketing Slack

capabilities.name: Slack Message to Notion Page
capabilities.description: Turn Slack messages into Notion pages for documentation or meeting notes.

capabilities.name: Slack Message to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log important Slack messages to Google Sheets for record keeping.

capabilities.name: Discord Message to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log Discord messages to Google Sheets for community analytics.

capabilities.name: Twilio SMS to CRM Activity
capabilities.description: Log incoming SMS messages as activities on the CRM contact.
capabilities.example_action: Update CRM contact with SMS activity

capabilities.name: Twilio SMS to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: Forward incoming SMS messages to a Slack channel for team visibility.

capabilities.name: Supabase Row to CRM Contact
capabilities.description: Create a CRM contact whenever a new user signs up in your Supabase app.
capabilities.example_trigger: New row in Supabase users table
capabilities.example_action: Create CRM contact from user data

capabilities.name: Supabase Row to SendGrid Email
capabilities.description: Send a transactional email via SendGrid when a new row is inserted in Supabase.

capabilities.name: Resend Email to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: Log all transactional emails sent via Resend to Google Sheets for tracking.
